At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. "I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other." Michael Vick looked sharp

He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. Eric Schmidt said he and Google's founders are currently laying out the details of their management roles. He wrote about the move in a blog post on the company's blog: As executive chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach and internally as an advisor to Larry and Sergey[ Brin]. Eric Schmidt said the restructuring in management will produce "even better success" for the company. However, many analysts are skeptical as to whether Page is ready to take on Google's top position.

Donald Rumsfeld arrives bang on time and greets me with a disconcertingly warm smile. He is dressed formally in a gray suit, pale blue shirt and striped tie. He sits down and swiftly asks me a question: Have you read the book? What was your reaction?
